removeID(String) - Method in class fs.xml.PolyglotStringTable
Removes an ID and all associated variants from this table.
removeLanguage(String) - Method in class fs.xml.PolyglotStringTable

removePath(String) - Method in class fs.xml.XMLDirectoryTree
This will remove the node corresponding to the last part of the filename path and all its subnodes.
removeResourceDependent(ResourceDependent) - Method in class fs.xml.ResourceDirectory
Removes a ResourceDependent object from the list of registered objects, if included in this list (If not, this call is ignored).
ResourceDependent - Interface in fs.xml
This interface indicates that a class, especially the implementation, depends on certain file resources (usually Schema files, templates, etc..).
ResourceDirectory - Class in fs.xml
A ResourceDirectory is used to summarize several ResourceDependent objects that use a common resource reference (e.g.
ResourceDirectory(String) - Constructor for class fs.xml.ResourceDirectory
Creates a resource directory with the specified base directory
ResourceDirectory(ResourceReference) - Constructor for class fs.xml.ResourceDirectory
Creates a resource directory using the specified ResourceReference
ResourceReference - Interface in fs.xml
This interface can be understood as the dual interface to ResourceDependent.
ResourceTest - Class in fs.test
